conversation.text: I was working with libmpeg. We can use that instead of reimplementing multiple format support
Can it generate raw? If not, I can only work with .wav for now
It can interconvert any format except raw. If you implement .wav, that will be perfect.
If it is a .dll, we can integrate it into our app
No, it is an .exe console thats input and output path and cornert format as argument
Then we can bind it into our installer and set path in USER. What license is libmpeg?
Its LGPL. We can provide dynamic link or if our app can be modular, we may try static link
Ugh, LGPL is so problematic. So how about backward compatibility?
They are fully backward compatible but not forward.
Then I think we should go static. We better not rely on users for our app to work properly.
